Node.Text: ...add a backwards eight here... then this and then... Oh, can I help you? Oh, yes, good evening, sir. Who are you?
I am Mr. Devlin. I started working here a few days ago. Which floor, sir?
I'm Mr. Devlin, I'm new. Now what floor?
Third floor, if you would. Now, where was I... yes, yes, add this here, then rotate it, and they'll never be able to crack it!
Is that the Sunday paper? I see that you're doing the puzzle.
Not quite, I'm doing this for personal interest. There's much more to the paper than puzzles.
I see... well, have a nice evening, sir.
Is that some kind of puzzle for those spy games or something?
No, but it's rather funny that you should mention such a thing. Tell me, who are you really?
I'm just an elevator operator, that's all.
I've told you the truth already. Calm down.
Hmm, I suppose time will tell. Good night.
